.. _tutorials-included:

Title using `-`
---------------

Title using `*`
***************

Title using `=`
===============

Title using `%%`
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

print("A simple code block")

# with a comment

# <> A code block

print("A code block")

# <> A collapsible code block
# collapse

print("A code block")

# <> A collapsible (open) code block
# collapse: open

print("A code block")


.. md-tab-set::
    :class: custom-tab-set-style

    .. md-tab-item:: tab_1

        [i for i in range(5)]

        # a comment



        Some text


    .. md-tab-item:: tab 2



        This is how to include text.


print("Be careful. If this is followed by <> it does not get included")
# todo: maybe it needs to get fixed

.. md-tab-set::
    :class: custom-tab-set-style

    .. md-tab-item:: example

        "ABS"

# <> Imports


New Title
~~~~~~~~~

print("If you include a separator, like some text")





# <> Imports


using
~~~~~

# example code

using matplotlib
